wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant General Sir George Judd Harding  (1788 – 5 July 1860) was a British Army officer who became Lieutenant Governor of Jersey.

response: Harding's battery was built on the remains of the 7th Europa Battery in 1859. The battery was named after Sir George Harding, who was Chief Engineer in 1844 and had been involved with Sir Charles Holloway in the 1810 destruction of the Spanish fortifications including Fort St. Felipe and Fort St. Barbara.History of the Royal Sappers and Miners At that time Europa Point was known as Harding's Point. For a few years the battery had two 18 pounder guns but these were replaced in 1863 with two 32 pounders.
